name: @jurca/klondike
description: Klondike (AKA Canfield AKA Solitaire AKA American Patience) implementation in TypeScript, with separated logic and view, history of gameboard states and (some) configurable rules.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm test && npm run compile && mkdir dist/node_modules/ && cp -r node_modules/@jurca dist/node_modules && npm run bundle && cp ui/minimalistic/index.html dist/ui/minimalistic/

author: Martin Jurƒça <martin.jurca@firma.seznam.cz>
